title: Piedmont 42 Trade (Cobb red for Young glove)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: Piedmont 42 Trade (Cobb red for Young glove)
posts.post_content:
Hello. I am interested in trading for a copy of the Cy Young glove shows with a Piedmont factory 42 back.

For trade, I have an attractive Ty Cobb red portrait with the Piedmont 42 back. Despite the low technical grade, it is my opinion that the card presents very nicely, with a strong image and a gorgeous advertising reverse. Unfortunately, there is some light paper loss around parts of the white border, which do not effect the image. Where the paper loss is most relevant is on the "C" and the second "B" in "Cobb", but otherwise the card is very strong.

I you have a match and have any interest in discussing a potential trade please free to shoot me a PM.

Thank you very much for your time.

Derek
